title: How many real daughters does Eminem actually have? - Quora

response.answer_text: Eminem has three daughters. Only biological daughter is Hailey Jade Mathers, born to em's ex-wife Kimberly Scott. Second daughter is Aliana Scott Mathers, also known as Lainey. She is the adopted daughter of former couple Em and Kim. She's the biological daughter of Kim's twin sister. Technically Em's niece, adopted as a daughter. Third daughter is Whitney Scott Mathers. She was born as a result of Kim's extra-marital affair with another man. Yeah, she cheated on Em. Later Em adopted her too. She's currently 15.

he has one real child, and 2 step children, hailie is his own and Whitney lane is Kim Scott s doughter from another guy, Alaina is Kim's sister's doughter, Eminem has been father for all of them tho, in song mockingbird he tells something about them and the music video of when I'm gone has a scene with 3 girl playing in a garden, they are sembols of them.
